titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: I spent the morning in making sure that everything was in trim for tomorrow's function. First, I went to that cormorant
: then I secured my episcopal hat from
: then I called on the Dean at West
and went with him to the Intercession service. Finally, I returned to the Deanery in time to hear
play. The Archbishop sent me a very kind letter in answer to that which I wrote to him (v. p. 152)
